name: Pew Pew Pew (Jessica Wei)
description:
Description
Pew Pew Pew  is a game made at CSULB's first official game jam: Slam Jam! The player is in hell with many mobs that are feeling down and shoots them into different dimensions where they become happy-- you just can't see it.

Team: It's Actually a Monarchy
Justin Cheung (Programming)
Elaine Esparza (Art)
Ariel Nam (Programming)
Chi Ngo (Art)
Jon Slaon Jr. (Art)
Jessica Wei (Sound & Programming)
